content:
Sure, here are 25 more funny prompts with animals:

1. A close-up shot of a raccoon wearing a magician's hat, pulling a galaxy-themed rabbit out of a hat.
2. A full-body picture of a koala wearing a superhero cape, flying through the galaxy to save the day.
3. An artistic shot of a hedgehog wearing a top hat and monocle, enjoying a galaxy-themed tea party with other animals.
4. A close-up shot of a penguin wearing a cowboy hat and boots, riding a mechanical bull in a hilarious rodeo scene.
5. A full-body picture of a monkey wearing a business suit, typing away on a computer in a galaxy-themed office.
6. A dramatic shot of a goat wearing a superhero costume, leaping through the galaxy to save the world.
7. A portrait of a parrot wearing a pirate hat, leading a crew of other animals in a hilarious galaxy-themed pirate adventure.
8. A full-length picture of a hamster wearing a princess dress, attending a galaxy-themed royal ball.
9. An artistic shot of a hummingbird wearing a chef's hat, cooking up a storm in a galaxy-themed kitchen.
10. A close-up shot of a sloth wearing a detective hat and smoking a pipe, solving a galaxy-themed mystery in a hilarious film noir spoof.
11. A full-body picture of a platypus wearing a superhero costume, battling villains in a galaxy-themed comic book.
12. A dramatic shot of a chameleon wearing a wizard's hat, casting spells in a galaxy-themed wizarding world.
13. A portrait of a flamingo wearing a ballerina tutu, performing a hilarious dance routine in a galaxy-themed ballet.
14. A full-length picture of a meerkat wearing a scientist lab coat, conducting experiments in a galaxy-themed laboratory.
15. An artistic shot of an octopus wearing a top hat and cane, performing in a hilarious galaxy-themed musical extravaganza.
16. A close-up shot of a chipmunk wearing a graduation cap, delivering a hilarious galaxy-themed commencement speech.
17. A full-body picture of a duck wearing a superhero costume, flying through the galaxy to fight crime.
18. A dramatic shot of a llama wearing a detective trench coat, solving a galaxy-themed mystery in a hilarious film noir spoof.
19. A portrait of a bear wearing a chef's apron, cooking up delicious galaxy-themed meals in a hilarious cooking show.
20. A full-length picture of a snail wearing a racing helmet, participating in a hilarious galaxy-themed racing competition.
21. An artistic shot of a skunk wearing a top hat and cane, tap dancing in a galaxy-themed musical extravaganza.
22. A close-up shot of a turtle wearing a king's crown, ruling over a galaxy-themed kingdom with a slow but steady hand.
23. A full-body picture of a zebra wearing a superhero costume, running at super-speeds through the galaxy.
24. A dramatic shot of a alligator wearing a pirate hat, searching for treasure in a hilarious galaxy-themed pirate adventure.
25. A portrait of a deer wearing a space helmet, exploring the galaxy and discovering new worlds in a hilarious sci-fi adventure.
